state.tooltip: State where the anti-CRT activity was introduced

body.tooltip: Name of Governing Official, state, or local entity or legislature

bill.tooltip: The official number assigned to the proposed or enacted state law

type.tooltip: Instrument being used to advance anti-CRT activity

target.tooltip: The type of entity the anti-CRT activity is attempting to regulate

options.tooltip: Collection of lessons, facts, theories, assessments, and concepts taught in school

statement_content.tooltip: Only applies to anti-CRT activity identified as statements

trigger.tooltip: Features of the regulated conduct that trigger anti-CRT restrictions
